index.title: Fullstack Developer
index.description: I'm James Córdoba, a fullstack web developer passionate about building innovative solutions that enhance user experience. With skills in frontend and backend, I blend technical expertise and creativity to turn ideas into impactful, functional products. I'm driven by continuous learning, real value creation, and growing alongside teams that aim higher.
